synopsis.text: Shou Nakamoto, Tougo Arai, Mikimaro Shimura, Yuusuke Katou, and Shimon Takagi, five inseparable friends, are on the brink of concluding their high school journey at Seiryu High School, an all-boys boarding school. As the school prepares to celebrate its five-hundredth anniversary and the annual festival, the drama club president, Mizuho Kusanagi, hatches a cunning plan. Known for his eccentric ideas, Kusanagi coerces the five friends into starring in the play "Little Women," with a twist: they must don women's attire for their roles. With no other choice, the friends reluctantly agree to participate. As they begrudgingly rehearse for the play, they unknowingly embark on a journey of self-discovery and growth. Will the friends rise to the challenge and embrace their roles, or will they crumble under the pressure? Join them on this unique and heartwarming adventure that promises laughter, camaraderie, and a touch of drama.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
